description: Respiratory Disturbance Index at 3% oxygen desaturation.  Ratio of the count of all apneas (central and obstructive) and hypopneas associated with at least a 3% oxygen desaturation to the total sleep time expressed in hours. [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 3% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + carbp3 + carop3 + canbp3 + canop3 + oarbp3 + oarop3 + oanbp3 + oanop3 ) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 3% oxygen desaturation
